verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is the Rock. (3x)
Jesus is the Rock of my salvation.
Jesus is the Rock. (3x)
Jesus is the Rock of my salvation.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though the winds may blow,
Though the sun may shine,
Jesus is the Rock of my mind.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's the cloud by day
And the fire by night,
The strength of my hands.
He's leading me on to acomplish His plan. (2x)
